name: Manygolf
description:
Manygolf is a free massively multiplayer golf game! You and up to hundreds of other golfers play on the same procedurally-generated golf courses, vying for the top score on the championship leaderboard.Features
  • Infinite exciting rounds of championship golf with hundreds of other players!
  • Compete with your Steam and Twitter friends using the friends leaderboard!
  • Take your golfing prowess on the go by linking your account to the browser and mobile versions of Manygolf!
